name: Rapunzel's Trial (fix)
description:
SOLVED

v1.1.

  • Now the play button works when exit the menu or  finish the game.
  • Now you don't have to unpause in order to come back to the menu after P press.
  • Added "arrows" controls and "enter", "w" & "up arrow" for jumping.

v1.2.

  • Fixed when reseting scene checkpoints.
  • Timer now resets when "Esc + R".

v1.3.

  •  Jump when reset fixed.
  • When restart hazards didn't work, fixed.
  • Times weren't saving correctly, now they do.
